title: Today is Your Day!
itunes:title: Today is Your Day!
description:
A lot of times, we have faith for the future. But true faith is always in the present. In this exciting message, Joel will show you why the Bible teaches us to have hope for today and not for tomorrow. ----Visit https://joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.----Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? https://instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
